item.description:
The Socialist Party of Boston will meet at noon on Sunday, 27 April 2008 in the Lucy Parsons Center. May Day is right around the corner, our rescheduled benefit concert is approaching, and summer is almost here. Join us as we hear back from April antiwar events and plan our upcoming campaigns! For more information, check out the preliminary agenda below.

The Lucy Parsons Center is located at 549 Columbus Ave. in the South End, near the Mass Ave. T stop on the Orange Line, the Symphony T stop on the Green Line (E), and the #1 bus line.

see you there! :-)
item.name: The Boston Democratic Socialism April Meeting
